short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes Google Slides video player more seamless

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides the video play bar and video player UI in a Google Slides presentation so that the video plays seamlessly (without the audience realizing it's a video.) Never give a boring presentation again. This extension enables Slides of Surprise animations to work in Google Slides.

Press Cntrl+M or Command+M to toggle the video player graphics.

FYI - You will still need to purchase the animations from our website, but this extension will make the illusion work.
